THAT'S WHY I AM A LEADER: Leadership. When Cyclops uses it, if he is on an X-Men themed team, increase his Leadership roll by 1.

Yeah I was thinking the same thing. For the leadership and just being a good team player, he's great for sure.

hoojeebo
See, this is why comments on Units are awesome (or can be). I too looked at this Cyclops and was like "Meh", but people pointing out how he's different than other Cyclopes have made me look at him in a different light.
December 23, 2021
Hellboy the Bellboy
The RF Cyclops is 5pts cheaper with the same attack/damage but with PsyBlast. That said if I'm playing a Cyclops it's usually as a Leadership piece and a secondary or tertiary attacker. 50/50 Leadership is a big draw for me.
December 19, 2021
WelcomeToDIE
At first I thought meh, but this Slim offers a fair bit. First off, we haven't gotten double targets on Cyclops since Ultimates. IT: Hindering has only been done on one other from Xavier's School who lacks the X-Men TA. Odd since Cyke is a trickshot pro. He also doesn't even lose out on respectable combat values and 6 clix of health despite his low cost. I'm a fan of him.
December 14, 2021
Brundun94
In the 40 - 60 range range, there are better options? The only other in that range in recent history is from HOX at 45, and while he is great, he has one less click of life, one less target, and not quite as much overall utility as this guy. I think he's a great option on Xmen teams that want token removal.
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
Not even some toughness? Just walk up and smack him to KO - Rick James style.
December 7, 2021
Goop
There are just better Cyclops options out there. The one from Rise and Fall is substantially better. This one is likely to get knocked to his naked defense and then killed off easy enough. At least his atk/range/target values, are good for his points though.
